name: The Muggufin Cave
description:
Instructions: Use the arrow keys to move.

You must seek out and claim the ancient muguffin that lies within the caves. But be wary for you are not the first to venture here. Many have perished at the hands of the traps and pitfalls that dot the cave network or worse, become hopelessly lost. 

Will you be the one to claim the muguffin?

University Project
